snippet: Brad Keselowski passed Kyle Busch with five laps to go and surged to his second win in three years in the Nascar Kobalt 400, a Sprint Cup Series race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
abstract: Brad Keselowski wins Nascar Kobalt 400 auto race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski passed Kyle Busch with five laps to go and surged to his second win in three years in the Nascar Kobalt 400, a Sprint Cup Series race at Las Vegas Motor Speedway.
